I guess you're using the C bindings of numpy? If so you should [pin it to an ABI compatible version](https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html?highlight=numpy#building-against-numpy):
```suggestion
  - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
```

I made the recommended changes to the meta.yaml, plus I also got rid of `build:    - {{ compiler('c') }}` since I realized I dont need it. Looking at the article you linked, adding `{{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}` looks like a good idea.
